item.title: Grow my youtube starting with 1 video to see results - Upwork
item.description:
I am interested in looking to grow my youtube  - https://www.youtube.com/@AI_Data_Demystified/videos

Please read the requirements carefully before applying for this job

I will start with only 1 video to test the effectiveness. Below the link to that video

https://youtu.be/yHBjG8umPcM?si=vf7FYtp7gSw_Zs7c

I am looking to post messages and link to the above video on Linkedin, Reditt, Discord, facebook to grow my channel organically

Please give a quote for number of social media post you will be doing. please make sure that the post has to be catchy with the right words, professional, no spelling mistakes. i will be reviewing the first few messages going on social media.

Improve the search ranking for this video.

share where do you post the videos? and by who's id?

Thanks


Budget: $25

item.title: Youtube Shorts Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Youtube Shorts Creator to join our team and help grow our channel.  I will provide the images and the audio, you just have to edit it. As a Youtube Shorts Creator, you will be responsible for creating engaging and high-quality short videos that align with our brand and target audience. Your primary focus will be on creating captivating content, editing, adding relevant sound effects, and ensuring each video is optimized for maximum reach.

  Responsibilities:
  - Brainstorming and creating innovative and trending concepts for Youtube Shorts
  - Filming and editing short videos using professional software
  - Adding relevant sound effects and music to enhance the visual experience
  - Optimizing videos for maximum engagement and reach
  
  Requirements:
  - Proven experience as a Youtube Shorts Creator or similar role
  - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro/Final Cut Pro
  - Strong knowledge of current trends and best practices for Youtube Shorts
  - Creative mindset with the ability to come up with unique and engaging ideas
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

  If you are passionate about creating compelling short videos that grab attention and drive engagement, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and help take our Youtube channel to the next level!

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 22, 2024 22:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Marketing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Needed for Consistent Work **LONG TERM** (START IMMEDIATELY) - Upwork
item.description:
looking for fluent English speakers to create simple app testimonial tutorial videos ...

⚠️  YOU MUST HAVE An iPhone to Show in The Video And A RECORDING DEVICE (Can be another phone, or a camera)

⚠️You MUST Speak Fluent English

✅ Examples of videos youd be making
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1oZMeijsTbkM8_m49P5u4cAStwZzVjx9d/view?usp=sharing

✅ YOU WILL GET CONSISTENT WORK WEEKLY, And this will be a LONG TERM INCOME SOURCE For you thats very easy to do . which is why this is so worth it , if your looking for  extra easy income

Everything will be explained to you on how to create the videos, there very easy to do, everything will be explained for you.


✅ each video takes roughly 10-15 minutes to record,

✅ You will be paid $7 Per Video

😊   these videos require 0 editing, so you just make them quickly then upload and share it with google drive.

✅ you must be available frequently and be able to complete the batches fast and make vids daily.

⚠️ if you are too busy, then Do NOT APPLY.

⚠️ you MUST Show your face in the video , so be comfortable with that

Send me videos with your voice in it, so i can hear how you sound

Write "UNDERSTOOD" so i know you read everything or you'll be IGNORED!


Budget: $7

item.title: YouTube Shorts Creator with Female Voiceover - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative individual who can create engaging YouTube shorts using B-roll footage and a text thread conversation. The shorts will require a female voiceover to narrate the text conversation. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing, storytelling, and incorporating voiceovers. Attention to detail and the ability to deliver high-quality content within a short timeframe are essential.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Voiceover narration
- Attention to detail

This gig is suitable for an intermediate-level freelancer.


Posted On: June 22, 2024 21:25 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Female, Audio Editing, US English Dialect
Skills: Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Female, Audio Editing, US English Dialect
